title: Halo Director Clarifies Halo 5 PC Comments
text:
Halo Director Clarifies Halo 5 PC Comments 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
Halo franchise director Frank O'Connor has spoken out to clarify comments he made recently about the possibility of Xbox One exclusive Halo ...
